General.Name: Atlas Resources Tbk
General.Description: PT Atlas Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, acquires, explores for, develops, produces, and sells coal in Indonesia and internationally. It produces high-calorie and metallurgical coal for use in the steel production and power generation, cement, and other general manufacturing facilities. The company holds various mining concessions in Indonesia. It is also involved in the trading, services, construction, transportation, workshop, printing, investment, logistics, industry, and agricultural activities. PT Atlas Resources Tbk was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Sampoerna Strategic Square, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12930
